title: 求支持1.5.2的forge modloader地址...我搜不到...
author: zdyxiaokeai
txt_content: RT...想玩立体机动mod来着,求mcbbs搬运贴地址- -

replies.author: alecone
replies.txt_content:
官方网站.
www.minecraftforge.net
可能某些运营商的客户无法上.
forge新版已自带forge mod loader,无需单独安装了.

replies.author: zdyxiaokeai
replies.txt_content:
